title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Social Studies Practical Competencies Through Demonstration-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain social field practical procedures with ≥80% accuracy through demonstration-based training
Learners can imitate and apply complex social problem-solving processes using observational learning strategies
Learners can analyze demonstration content and propose improvements through active participation activities (pre-/during-/post-activities)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
